evs.name: Health Certificate
evs.description: Application of the interested party or his/her guardian or other authorized person, which is given by the offices of the competent services of the Regional Offices or the KEP.

evidence.name: Statement of goods transport
evidence.description: Analytical statement of the goods to be transported as well as a document with their technical characteristics in Greek.

evidence.name: Certificate of suitability of the goods to be transported
evidence.description: Certificate of suitability of the goods to be transported

evidence.name: Electronic Solemn Declaration
evidence.description: The procedure concerns the issuance of an electronic solemn declaration by the interested party, without requiring a visit to an administrative authority branch or KEP.

evidence.name: Certified copy of the articles of association
evidence.description: Certified copy of the act of appointment of a representative of the board of directors of the S.A. Certified copy of the articles of association or company in the case of a legal entity of another form.

evidence.name: Copy of criminal record
evidence.description: The procedure concerns the issuance of a Copy of Criminal Record, which is granted: a) in criminal proceedings and b) for the issuance of an Administrative Act of a Public Authority, where required by law as supporting documentation

criterion_requirments.name: To be a pyrotechnics trader or legal representative of a company that trades pyrotechnics
